item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>Don't sound quite so smug!! Well done for retrieving the money!!</p>
item.content:encoded: Don’t sound quite so smug!! Well done for retrieving the money!!

item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>Enjoy Washington Matthew, we're off to Denmark soon, I hoping to get some signitures of ITFC squad, glad everything sorted on villa front.</p>
item.content:encoded: Enjoy Washington Matthew, we’re off to Denmark soon, I hoping to get some signitures of ITFC squad, glad everything sorted on villa front.
